common: There are no available data on use in pregnant women Advise pregnant women of the potential risk of miscarriage (based on animal data)

description: When administered to pregnant rabbits during the period of organogenesis at doses that were comparable to the recommended human dose based on body surface area, defibrotide sodium decreased the number of implantations and viable fetuses
